articles.content:
National sports contest for "Jongilbong Prize" 
    Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The 28th national sports contest of school youth and children for "Jongilbong Prize" was held in Wonsan on the east coast of Korea from August 26 to September 3 on the occasion of the first youth day (august 28) in the new century.
 Players of senior middle schools selected from all provinces competed in the basketball, football, table tennis, marathon, swimming, Taekwon-do and other events.

Jiang Zemin visits ostrich farm
articles.content:
Jiang Zemin visits ostrich farm 
    Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) - Jiang Zemin, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the people's Republic of China, today visited the ostrich farm in the suburbs of Pyongyang.
 Kim Jong Il, General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Accompanied him.    
 Jiang Zemin and his suite members looked round the computer room, hatchery, breed ostrich pen, ostrich meat processing factory, etc. of the modernly equipped farm.
